thread.title: Bart Rombaut

author: Bart Rombaut
title: Bart Rombaut
text:
Do check the little things, like engine oil, before taking off.
Besides this, ask for the exit from the airport (Zaventem - Belgium) since this was quite complicated.
We took an additional insurance policy, quite reasonable in price. Study the technical manual of the on board computer before starting your journey - we had to find things out on the road.
